label: Letter from Mrs. Joseph Brockington to Nation Board of the Y.W.C.A., August 14, 1967
description: Correspondence from Mrs. Joseph Brockington, Bookkeeper and Secretary for the Coming Street Y.W.C.A., to the Savings and Security Plan and the Retirement Fund for the National Board of the Y.W.C.A. regarding financial matters.
